doc:
Don Michael Paul https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Michael_Paul 0 Don Michael Paul (born April 17, 1963) is an actor, director, writer and producer.He starred in the films Heart of Dixie and Rich Girl with Jill Schoelen and appeared in Aloha Summer. He wrote the screenplay for Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man. He acted in the short-lived 1992 CBS detective series The Hat Squad. He played a prominent role in Models Inc. and Robot Wars. He has directed several films including Half Past Dead in 2002, Lake Placid: The Final Chapter (2012) and Tremors 5: Bloodlines. Don_Michael_Paul ( born April_17_,_1963 ) is an_actor_,_director_,_writer_and_producer.He starred in the_films_Heart of Dixie and Rich_Girl with Jill_Schoelen and appeared in Aloha_Summer . He wrote the_screenplay for Harley_Davidson and the_Marlboro_Man . He acted in the_short-lived_1992_CBS_detective_series The_Hat_Squad . He played a_prominent_role in Models_Inc._and_Robot_Wars . He has_directed several_films_including_Half_Past_Dead in 2002 , Lake_Placid : The_Final_Chapter_(_2012_)_and_Tremors_5 : Bloodlines .
